Title: LRO LROC DEM, Plato Ejecta, 15m Color Roughness Hazard
Abstract: 这是一个主题颜色粗糙度危险图，来源于Plato Ejecta的局部粗糙度图LRO_NAC_roughness_15m_53N354E_150cmp.tif。粗糙度危险分类颜色范围是任意的，但代表了最近的着陆器和火星车设计，其中粗糙度等级相当于15米的车辆直径。
Projection:
PROJCS['Equirectangular_MOON_53N',
	GEOGCS['GCS_MOON',
		DATUM['MOON',SPHEROID['MOON_localRadius',1737400,0]],
		PRIMEM['Reference_Meridian',0],UNIT['degree',0.0174532925199433]],
	PROJECTION['Equirectangular'],
	PARAMETER['latitude_of_origin',0],
	PARAMETER['central_meridian',0],
	PARAMETER['standard_parallel_1',53],
	PARAMETER['false_easting',0],
	PARAMETER['false_northing',0],UNIT['metre',1,AUTHORITY['EPSG','9001']]]
